name: lion_spawn_05
text: Hell hath no fury like me.
text_simple: hell hath no fury like me

name: lion_spawn_06
text: All hell's broken loose, and I hold the pieces.
text_simple: all hells broken loose and i hold the pieces

name: lion_attack_05
text: I'll put the squeeze on you!
text_simple: ill put the squeeze on you

name: lion_cast_02
text: Here's all you need of hell!
text_simple: heres all you need of hell

name: lion_cast_03
text: Feel the rage of a mage!
text_simple: feel the rage of a mage

name: lion_ability_voodoo_09
text: That's a good look for you.
text_simple: thats a good look for you

name: lion_kill_03
text: When you get to hell, tell them I sent you.
text_simple: when you get to hell tell them i sent you

name: lion_kill_05
text: You thought to tame the lion?
text_simple: you thought to tame the lion

name: lion_kill_08
text: By my horns, you'll not live to see the dawn!
text_simple: by my horns youll not live to see the dawn

name: lion_kill_09
text: Death is only the start of your suffering.
text_simple: death is only the start of your suffering

text: All we need now is a wardrobe.

name: lion_death_01
text: I've already been to Hell; what else can they do to me.
text_simple: ive already been to hell what else can they do to me

name: lion_death_09
text: The lion's heart beats no more.
text_simple: the lions heart beats no more

name: lion_death_10
text: My rage will bring me back.
text_simple: my rage will bring me back

name: lion_respawn_01
text: I've been to hell and back, and back to hell...and back.
text_simple: ive been to hell and back and back to hell and back

name: lion_respawn_02
text: Time to take matters into my own hand.
text_simple: time to take matters into my own hand

name: lion_respawn_03
text: I don't fear Hell; Hell fears me.
text_simple: i dont fear hell hell fears me

name: lion_respawn_08
text: My rage returns me to the living.
text_simple: my rage returns me to the living

name: lion_respawn_10
text: This time, I've brought Hell back with me.
text_simple: this time ive brought hell back with me

name: lion_rare_01
text: When the demon betrayed me, I took its very arm. Imagine what I'll do to a mere hero.
text_simple: when the demon betrayed me i took its very arm imagine what ill do to a mere hero

name: lion_rare_02
text: Betray me, and I'll chase you into Hell.
text_simple: betray me and ill chase you into hell

name: lion_rare_03
text: Behold, I am what remains when you burn away everything but rage and revenge.
text_simple: behold i am what remains when you burn away everything but rage and revenge

text: That nearly cost me an arm and a leg.
text_simple: that nearly cost me an arm and a leg
